nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines all function to allow borrowers interact with their escrow contracts.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowInterface

nodes.documentation:
@notice It calls a given dapp using a delegatecall function by a borrower owned the current loan id associated to this escrow contract.
@param dappData the current dapp data to be executed.
nodes.name: callDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the borrower for this Escrow's loan.
@return address of this Escrow's loans
nodes.name: getBorrower

nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculate this Escrow instance total value.
@return This Escrow instance total value expressed in ETH and Token value.
nodes.name: calculateTotalValue

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if this Escrow loan value is undervalued based its token price.
@return true if this escrow loan is undervalued based on its token price.
nodes.name: isUnderValued

nodes.documentation:
@notice Repay this Escrow's loan.
@dev If the Escrow's balance of the borrowed token is less than the amount to repay, transfer tokens from the sender's wallet.
nodes.name: repay
claimTokens
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@notice Notifies when the Escrow's tokens have been claimed.
@param recipient address where the tokens where sent to.
nodes.name: TokensClaimed

nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines all function to allow borrowers interact with their escrow contracts.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowInterface

nodes.documentation:
@notice It calls a given dapp using a delegatecall function by a borrower owned the current loan id associated to this escrow contract.
@param dappData the current dapp data to be executed.
nodes.name: callDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the borrower for this Escrow's loan.
@return address of this Escrow's loans
nodes.name: getBorrower

nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculate this Escrow instance total value.
@return This Escrow instance total value expressed in ETH and Token value.
nodes.name: calculateTotalValue

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if this Escrow loan value is undervalued based its token price.
@return true if this escrow loan is undervalued based on its token price.
nodes.name: isUnderValued

nodes.documentation:
@notice Repay this Escrow's loan.
@dev If the Escrow's balance of the borrowed token is less than the amount to repay, transfer tokens from the sender's wallet.
nodes.name: repay
claimTokens
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@notice Notifies when the Escrow's tokens have been claimed.
@param recipient address where the tokens where sent to.
nodes.name: TokensClaimed

calculateTotalValue().return: This Escrow instance total value expressed in ETH and Token value.

params.dappData: the current dapp data to be executed.

claimTokens(address).details: The loan must not be active.The recipient must either be the loan borrower OR the loan must be already liquidated.

params.recipient: address to send the tokens to.

params.aLoanID: the loan ID associated to this escrow instance.

isUnderValued().return: true if this escrow loan is undervalued based on its token price.

repay(uint256).details: If the Escrow's balance of the borrowed token is less than the amount to repay, transfer tokens from the sender's wallet.

calculateTotalValue().notice: Calculate this Escrow instance total value.

callDapp((address,bytes)).notice: It calls a given dapp using a delegatecall function by a borrower owned the current loan id associated to this escrow contract.

claimTokens(address).notice: Sends the tokens owned by this escrow to the recipient.

getBorrower().notice: Gets the borrower for this Escrow's loan.

initialize(address,uint256).notice: It initializes this escrow instance for a given loans address and loan id.

isUnderValued().notice: Checks if this Escrow loan value is undervalued based its token price.

userdoc.notice: This interface defines all function to allow borrowers interact with their escrow contracts.
